Room.Name: Spiral Staircase
Room.ShortDescription: You are high on a spiraling staircase, looking down at the Enchanted Forest.
Room.LongDescription: This huge redwood tree is the largest in the entire forest, and the staircase winds around it through the clouds. Trantori, the High Invoker, is a member of the red-robed mages. He makes his summer home at the top of this redwood tree, and occasionally holds conferences for the order up here.
